name: MySQL5

getPSDEDataQueryCodeConds.customCond:
t1.`DELETED` = '0' 
AND FIND_IN_SET ( t1.ID, ( SELECT STORIES FROM ZT_BUILD WHERE ID = #{srf.datacontext.srfparentkey}  ) )
getPSDEDataQueryCodeConds.name: 查询条件

queryCode:
SELECT
	t1.`COLOR`,	
	t1.`ESTIMATE`,
	t1.`ID`,
	(
SELECT
	( CASE WHEN COUNT( t.IBZ_FAVORITESID ) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS ISFAVORITES 
FROM
	T_IBZ_FAVORITES t 
WHERE
	t.TYPE = 'story' 
	AND t.ACCOUNT = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfloginname} 
	AND t.OBJECTID = t1.id 
	) AS `ISFAVORITES`,	
	t11.`NAME` AS `MODULENAME`,
	t1.`OPENEDBY`,	
	t1.`PRI`,	
	t1.`STAGE`,
	t1.`STATUS`,	
	t1.`TITLE`,
	'' AS isChild ,
	t1.STORYSN 
FROM
	`zt_story` t1
	LEFT JOIN zt_module t11 ON t1.MODULE = t11.MODULESN 
	LEFT JOIN zt_story t21 ON t1.PARENT = t21.STORYSN 
	LEFT JOIN zt_product t31 ON t1.PRODUCT = t31.productsn 
	LEFT JOIN zt_branch t41 ON t1.BRANCH = t41.BRANCHSN
